summary: Moves Light Foot and Deadly Aim in the Sneak tree.
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana]This is very simple. It just moves the perks Light Foot and Deadly Aim very slightly to the side in the Sneak tree.

- Backstab will not be required for Deadly Aim nor Deadly Aim required for Assassin's Blade. It never made sense to mix ranged and melee requirements, so I've fixed it.

- Because you might not actually want Light Foot, it's now optional in the tree and no longer required to continue taking other perks.[/font]
author: Kevin Kidder
